title: Brine LoPro Superlight Lacrosse Arm Guard
features: Focused on providing added protection on last second slashes from opposing defenders
2-piece compression molded pad with ABS caps provides solid protection at a weight that is 30% lighter than most arm guards
Grid-Flex provides a secure form fit to your body
description: Ventilator Stretch Sleeve helps to shape the pad to the contours of your arm providing a form fit and preventing slippage while keeping you dry.
